label: Hello World - part 2: Functionality
info: ::: aim Demonstrate the use of computational functionality in the modification of data. ::: ::: explanation This flow is an extension of the *hello world* flow with added functionality to modify the data generated by the inject node. The functionality is represented by a function node that can be used to add Javascript code to a flow. The function node is connected to the inject node via a wire so the data from the inject node now flows to the function node before being passed on to the debug node to display the final result in the debug panel. ::: ### Related Flows - [Hello World, part 1](https://flowhub.org/f/7bac2d969ad2969f) - [Node-RED Introduction](https://flowhub.org/f/7f8714fa6e835a2a) which is a step-by-step guide for creating flows.

name: functionality
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload + ", hello Node-RED"

return msg;
